author: jsutton
title: Perfect piece for space ship docking ports
review: The 4x4x2 cone without the middle was a great piece for working into multi-module space vehicles as a docking port.  And you could put it upside down with 2x2 round bricks the right way up in the middle to invert a cone.  Glad to see its reappearance on the later train sets and the Y-Wing.
